title: unmeasurable-iframe
description: The advertising/viewability metric unmeasurable-iframe describes whether a measurement instrumented ad was not able to be measured due to it being inside one or more iFrames.

@id.description: The unique identifier of this metric.

schema:name.description: The advertising/viewability metric unmeasurable-iframe describes whether a measurement instrumented ad was not able to be measured due to it being inside one or more iFrames.

xdm:measurement.description: How to take measures of this metric.
